Hi there_

My name is Pradipta R. Sandri, and my nickname is elvxk on several social media. I am a bachelor's degree in informatics engineering, able to work individually or collaborate in a team. I have several skills that can be relied on in this era, such as web development, frontend development, music production and others. I am interested in the IT industry with my focus on web development and frontend development. Currently I work as customer support at Jagoan Hosting Indonesia

Malang, Indonesia
